title: Every time I try to submit a ticket, the submit button's colour changes but no ticket submits.
body: I am trying to submit a ticket for my account that got banned for using hacks, I'm trying to submit a zip file of video clips that shows my innocence. I have a feeling either my account is no longer able to submit tickets, or the file is too large. I also tried submitting the files by themselves but nothing worked.

replies.body:
I can't recall the exact number, but I believe the file size limit is 100MB. Try uploading the video files to a video host site (such as youtube) and link them in the ticket. This may resolve the issue you're seeing.

Let me know if you have any questions.
